content: knitted drops hat with norwegian pattern in karisma or merino extra fine drops extra 0-1148 drops design pattern no u-758 yarn group b size s/m l/xl xxl head circumference approx 57/58 - 59/60 - 61/62 cm / 22½ /22 3/4 - 23 1/4 /23½ - 24 /24½ materials drops karisma from garnstudio 100 g for all sizes in color no 37 dark gray blue 50 g for all sizes in color no 01 off white 50 g for all sizes in color no 70 light blue gray 50 g for all sizes in color no 48 wine red or use drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 100 g for all sizes in colour no 20 dark blue 50 g for all sizes in colour no 01 off white 50 g for all sizes in colour no 15 light greyish green 50 g for all sizes in colour no 11 red drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 cm / 16 size 4 mm/us 6 - or size needed to get 21 sts x 28 row in stockinette st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm drops circular needle 40 cm / 16 size 3 mm/us 2 5 - for rib worked in the round on circular needle switch to double pointed needles when needed uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=7233&cid=19
